name: agentc-ai-developer
description: Brief Minimo methodology with integrated microprocessos: /brief (Microprocesso 1.1) → /setup-local-observability (Microprocesso 1.2) → /spike-agentic (Microprocesso 1.3) with skills. Four commands with help-assistant agent. spike-agentic and microprocesso-1-2 skills for progressive disclosure. Agentic loop validation, architecture exploration, LangGraph patterns. Full support for greenfield and existing projects.
